actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to permit deferrals of principal and interest on outstanding Farmers Home Administration loans in disaster areas.

summary.text: Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to permit deferrals of principal and interest on outstanding Farmers Home Administration loans in disaster areas, for a period not to exceed three years from the date of such deferral.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to permit deferrals of principal and interest on outstanding Farmers Home Administration loans in disaster areas.
